<Data>"Camera needs to connect to the internet to provide effects, music, and other features for short videos.<br/><br/>By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing to our <a href =%1$s>User Agreement</a> and <a href =%2$s>Privacy Policy</a>, and allowing Camera to connect to the internet."</Data>

<Data>"Camera needs to connect to the internet to provide stickers for this feature.<br/><br/>By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing to our <a href =%1$s>User Agreement</a> and <a href =%2$s>Privacy Policy</a>, and allowing Camera to connect to the internet."</Data>

<Data>"Camera needs to connect to the internet to provide speech-to-text output functionality.<br/><br/>By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing to our <a href =%1$s>User Agreement</a> and <a href =%2$s>Privacy Policy</a>, and allowing Camera to connect to the internet."</Data>
